name: Chocolate Delight
description: A rich, moist chocolate cake layered with velvety chocolate ganache and topped with premium chocolate shavings.

name: Red Velvet Dream
description: Classic red velvet cake with cream cheese frosting, perfectly balanced flavors that melt in your mouth.

name: Vanilla Paradise
description: Light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake with smooth vanilla buttercream and delicate decorations.

name: Strawberry Bliss
description: Fresh strawberry cake with layers of real fruit and whipped cream, perfect for any celebration.

name: Caramel Fusion
description: Decadent caramel cake with layers of caramel buttercream and drizzled with golden caramel sauce.

name: Truffle Supreme
description: Luxurious chocolate truffle cake with dark chocolate layers and rich ganache for special occasions.

name: Black Forest
description: Classic German cake with layers of chocolate sponge, cherries, and whipped cream.

name: Lemon Zest
description: Refreshing lemon cake with tangy lemon curd and light lemon buttercream frosting.

name: Coffee Mocha
description: Rich coffee-flavored cake with mocha buttercream and chocolate coffee beans decoration.

name: Rainbow Delight
description: Colorful layered cake with vibrant rainbow colors and vanilla buttercream between each layer.

name: Tiramisu Dream
description: Italian-inspired tiramisu cake with coffee-soaked layers and mascarpone cream.

name: Blueberry Cheesecake
description: Creamy cheesecake with fresh blueberry topping and graham cracker crust base.

name: Chocolate Fudge
description: Decadent chocolate fudge cake with layers of rich chocolate and smooth fudge frosting.

name: Pineapple Upside Down
description: Classic pineapple upside-down cake with caramelized pineapple rings and cherries.

name: Buttercream Fantasy
description: Elegant cake with smooth buttercream frosting and beautiful floral decorations.

name: Hazelnut Delight
description: Rich hazelnut cake with layers of hazelnut cream and chocolate hazelnut spread.

name: Orange Cream
description: Zesty orange cake with light cream frosting and fresh orange zest decoration.

name: Mint Chocolate
description: Refreshing mint chocolate cake with layers of mint buttercream and chocolate ganache.

name: Coconut Paradise
description: Tropical coconut cake with coconut cream frosting and toasted coconut flakes.

name: Raspberry Swirl
description: Delicate vanilla cake with raspberry swirls and fresh raspberry buttercream.

name: Pistachio Dream
description: Unique pistachio cake with pistachio cream and crushed pistachio toppings.

name: Banana Caramel
description: Moist banana cake with layers of caramel and cream cheese frosting.

name: Cherry Blossom
description: Beautiful cherry cake with cherry compote and light vanilla frosting.

name: Mango Tango
description: Tropical mango cake with fresh mango pieces and mango cream frosting.

name: Almond Joy
description: Rich almond cake with chocolate and coconut layers, topped with almonds.

name: Cinnamon Spice
description: Warm cinnamon spice cake with cream cheese frosting and cinnamon sugar.

name: Peach Perfection
description: Fresh peach cake with peach slices and light whipped cream frosting.

name: Double Chocolate
description: Double-layered chocolate cake with chocolate chips and rich chocolate frosting.

name: Vanilla Bean
description: Premium vanilla bean cake with real vanilla bean specks and buttercream.

name: Chocolate Raspberry
description: Chocolate cake with fresh raspberry filling and chocolate ganache topping.
